website_summaries.verdict: Although the Asics GT 2000 6 received mixed reviews, the negative feedback seemed to have more weight than the positive. Users were pleased with the practical arch support and the balanced cushioning. However, there were various complaints about the shoe’s quality and durability. Likewise, many users thought it was not as comfortable as the previous version. Overall, it was an acceptable running shoe but still needed some improvements.
pros: The Asics GT 2000 6 provided excellent support for overpronation, said some
One wearer liked how the shoe was lighter than its predecessor
The shoe supported the arches precisely, stated a buyer
A reviewer mentioned that the midsole gave a well-balanced ride
Some customers were happy that the shoe was available in various width profiles
The heel grip was ultra-secure, according to an impressed user
cons: The mesh upper started ripping within less than a month of use, a disappointed user said
Another buyer commented that the upper’s stitches tore and stretched easily
Others seemed to agree that the upper has little durability
There was excessive friction against the ball of the foot, no matter what socks are worn, experienced one wearer
Not as stable as the earlier releases of GT 2000, according to a consumer
A user felt that the forefoot area was quite narrow and that it hindered adequate air circulation

customer_reviews.title: Not Fit For Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Been using Asics for at least 20 years, and always this type of shoe for support but this pair started to fall apart in less than a month. Not sure what Asics have changed but they are now a complete waste of money. Fortunately I got a full refund from Amazon who were very helpful. Now gone for the Gel Kayano instead and that seems great so far. The photos show them after less than 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serious Quality Issue
customer_reviews.text: Having had 10's of pairs of GT2000's in the past I ordered these without a second thought. Mistake. These are shocking compared to previous versions. There is no toe box - it just doesnt exist. The entire thing is made of thin mesh with no durability whatsoever. Also the previously sturdy leather wrapping of previous versions has gone. This is basically a sole with a mesh wrap. I have no idea how they can call these things stability shoes since they provide none at all. And given its nothing but mesh I cant see them lasting more than a few miles. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a refund. Stitching started coming away after 1 day of wearing them. Hadn't even gone for a proper run yet. Bought to replace a pair of gen3 GT-2000 (great shoes, lasted years), incredibly disappointed that the quality seems to have disappeared in these gen6.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Underneath of the flap of my right shoe rubs against ...
customer_reviews.text: Underneath of the flap of my right shoe rubs against my feet and hurts while walking and running. Not sure what is different in right shoe from the left shoe!!! Tried different ways of walking, tying shoes laces, more tight, less tight etc but of no avail. My most expensive pair of shoes will unfortunately stay in the shoe cup board :-(
customer_reviews.author: VEN P

customer_reviews.title: Unforgiving sole; too firm for running, ok for gym
customer_reviews.text: At the time of buying these trainers I was a loyal Asics fan and have been running many miles in various iterations of the GT-2000, and before that the GT-1000s. I was excited to get the latest version as I'd worn out my GT-2000 v5. However, these were a massive disappointment. The sole was really too firm and felt too unforgiving whilst out running. At first I assumed they just needed a bit more wearing in than usual. But after a dozen runs in what felt more than clogs than running shoes I gave up and bought some competing brands. I'm getting my money's worth by using these just for the gym and they are fine in that context.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but watch the sizing as they come up small
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, but they’re ASICS so that’s to be expected. I take a UK 11 in these and UK 10 in normal shoes. Apart from weird sizing they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Bub

customer_reviews.title: Toe Mesh Totally Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said the toe mesh is feeble and has developed a hole. I have had the same issue with previous pairs of GT-2000 but after longing periods and they generally fit me well so put up with it and do cover a lot of miles running but this pair has failed much more quickly after a few months and that is me and ASIC finished after this happening too often now. They are not fit for purpose and will look for another supplier/model.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: A change for the worse
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using ASICS for a long time. These ones are poor and I don’t know why. The mesh is failing and not just in the toe box. Suggest you buy the earlier version,
customer_reviews.author: Fluff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the review & write up on these trainers. I had blisters just walking 5 miles per day.
customer_reviews.author: watchman

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my son in March 2019. He over-pronates and Asics seem to be the best fit for him. Within 4 months the shoes had ripped. Quality is horrible. I thought for the price I would get something that would last longer. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Specific quality concern
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 20th pair of ASICS GT 2000 series trainers. I use them for road running 5k to marathon. Very disappointed with the last few pairs, as they have worn through at the inside at the very back above the heel. Contacted ASICS directly, but no joy. Will persevere for another 1 or 2 pairs, as hearing lots of similar reviews, in the hope ASICS fixes the problem, as otherwise a great show!
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Happy - but slim fitting
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a 10.5 UK in Asics - these are little narrower than i would normally buy... but then laced up correctly they fit like a glove but i would not wear them all day - just for running - which is fine for me.... you may consider getting a half size greater than usual if you are having then for leisure to wear all day.... but still a great running shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value trainers, wear well
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes, well ventilated and have worn well over 400 miles of mainly footpath runs, well cushioned, only complaint is the black version is a bit dull :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam Starr

customer_reviews.title: Defective after just 3 runs holes everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these trainers for 3 medium runs (10k-20k) they are both full of holes. I returned on 19 December to the seller and still no refund asked why I want a refund. I think the pictures say it all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Poor upper fabric quaility
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of pairs of GT6000 previous to the GT6000 6, all previous pairs were comfortable and good wear/life. However the fabric used on the GT2000 6 isn't up to the quality/durability of its predecessors and as such the fabric on the upper stared to break down after only a few runs. Contacted Amazon who have been great in organising a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W.

customer_reviews.title: Running shoe is an older model but still very comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Running shoe is great and have purchased before, would prefer it to be cheaper as it is is an older version
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy Lee

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought 2 pairs!
customer_reviews.text: Had to order one size up from normal size shoe. But very happy with ASICS trainers. I bought these for circuit training and have now bought a second identical pair for my outdoor 10k runs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sian

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Killer running shoes. As I ramp up my training, these have been a perfect companion. Well recommended if they work for your feet - best to go for a proper shoe fitting at a running store with a video setup to analyse your gate first.
customer_reviews.author: Alibyebye Essmob

customer_reviews.title: Very fast trainers.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the first pair back as they are smaller than you think. Go for at least 1/2 size bigger than you wear. However... Amazing pair of running shoes,fact!
customer_reviews.author: Col R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Did some research and these came out as good following Achilles surgery... comfortable and supportive. Can’t give more than 5 starts or I would!!
customer_reviews.author: BWAble

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with orthotic insoles
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for someone who is flat footed and seriously over pronates. Was able to put orthotic inserts in after taking insoles out
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the right shoe for me
customer_reviews.text: Now my third pair of the Ascics GT2xxx series shoe as im a hyperpronator and as always im very pleased with how good they are. And the price i paid for these was really good too. Other colours are a lot more expensive but i dont care what i look like, its all about the comfort and assistance
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: The webbing on the toe of the shoe split after ...
customer_reviews.text: The webbing on the toe of the shoe split after around four weeks of use (circa 20-25 miles a week) - Amazon replaced the shoes but the webbing has split on the new shoes after a few weeks use.
customer_reviews.author: David Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Great value long distance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue ones but the photo is wrong so I returned them and ordered the green. You do need to size up half a size. I am exceedingly happy with these shoes. So far I’ve done about 2 hours of mixed rugged trails and tarred roads. Great performance on both. I’ll use these shoes for marathon training and racing. The ride is incredible. Such a good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: chris hall

customer_reviews.title: Defective lump inside
customer_reviews.text: The left one is defective and has a lump along the inside of the shoe but I don't have anymore running shoesso obviously I have to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. W. Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who is delighted with these. Lightweight and excellent support and he'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: jenny g

customer_reviews.title: Normally good but this pair were defective
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of ASICS, all of which have been great however after only 4months of use, these have come apart where the uppers join the sole.
customer_reviews.author: John E Sillitoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I have ever purchased. Great brand and great price from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Oreilly

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe with disappointing durability
customer_reviews.text: Good support, they feel quite light. Unfortunately they have not lasted very long - with the mileage I do I usually get 9 months or so out of a pair - these have lasted just over 4. Glad I paid a heavily discounted price for them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are the fifth pair of gt 2000 trainers I have brought from Amazon and all five have fit perfectly and arrived on time. As soon as these ware out I shall be ordering another pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All ok eventually.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before due date but wonder why they had to be despatched from Tailand and not available from the UK. Apart from that all ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but fabric wears down fast
customer_reviews.text: Ive worn gt-2000s for years. These are extremely comfortable, however the fabric around the he wears away quite quickly compared with their older models.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Top class road running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Asics have scored yet another winner with their Gt-2000 6 model. Great fit - and they look great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A great fitting shoe for those who need some support. Around 10% lighter than previous models and also more breathable. Idea for 5K to marathon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lock

customer_reviews.title: much narrower, tighter fit than anticipated given past Gt-2000 ...
customer_reviews.text: much narrower, tighter fit than anticipated given past Gt-2000 Asics use- emphasising that you can't assume an updated version will fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: jane a

customer_reviews.title: Nice for, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit. Stays comfy even when been in the gym for hours
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as GT - 2000 5
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as GT - 2000 5 The older version of this shoe has more cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Metals8

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Very comfortable and decent support as expected. I like the colour scheme too, not as garish as some previous designs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W.

customer_reviews.title: Another great asics trainer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Firm enough and well coushioned. I ordered half size larger than usual shoe size and they fit perfectly. Great shoe
customer_reviews.author: raymond miller

customer_reviews.title: I can't wear these!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this model of trainer previously so bought the same size again. Unfortunately one of the shoes is much too tight so I can't wear them. I missed the returns window but I think this is a manufacturing error.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, light and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Liked these shoes very much! Nice looking, light and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Nader Fard

customer_reviews.title: Toe box issue
customer_reviews.text: Have run in ASICS for last 5 or so years - same size. I wore out the toe box on both feet within a couple of months. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Long

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but supportive
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and cushioned support - resolved nagging calf strain too!
customer_reviews.author: Euan T.

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable - my feet love them. i run every 2nd day. awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of laces to spare.but great fit and colour
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and colour. Like the weight. Fit is as expected for asics
customer_reviews.author: justin boyle

customer_reviews.title: I have had loads of pairs of ASICS and these ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had loads of pairs of ASICS and these seem to come up far narrower than previous pairs I’ve owned. Back to trying them on in shops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Have bought Asics before. Great trainer, very light and fit in the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good fit - ideal for purpose - i
customer_reviews.text: exactly has expected - high quality, good fit - ideal for purpose - i.e. a running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Dr Will Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very light.
customer_reviews.text: Good points Very light Good ventilation Nice feel when running Nice room in toe area Bad points Dig into ankles when running up hill Quality of how they are put together questionable, I mean if they were a going out shoe wouldn’t be happy, some glue over spray and label peel out of the box. However not much of an issue as it’s a running shoe. Overall better than the v4’s I replaced given weight drop and vent improvement. Hopefully ankle issue will go after they have been run in.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Poor quality split within 8 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Terrible These split on the flimsy material within a few weeks sadly just after my window to return Won’t be buying Asics again
customer_reviews.author: R Beaumont

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gt-2000 6 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The men's GT-2000 6 is the ideal shoe for hyperpronators. You can reach the goal in the post-race. GEL cushioning visible in the hindfoot, while FluidRide technology provides the ultimate combination of rebound and cushioning properties, with reduced weight and exceptional durability. Wrap the central part of the foot. Features: 10 mm lowered heel, Impact Guidance System (IGS), FluideRide, Guidance Line, Dynamic Duomax, Trusstic Stability, Visible Backfoot Gel, External Stability Coins, Ortholite Insole, Ortholite Internal Lining, 3 m Reflectivity.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper - Improves ventilation to keep you cool.
Wider forefoot - Reduces risk of irritation and allows for natural toe splay.
Seamless construction - Minimises risk of rubbing and blisters.
Heat welded overlays - Swathe the foot in stability plus durability.
